titleStmt.title: To hit a mark, as well upon ascents and descents, as upon the plain of the horizon experimentally and mathematically demonstrated / by Robert Anderson.
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Robert, fl. 1668-1696.

notesStmt.note: "Warlike musick illustrated, in several consorts of Phrygian flutes": p. 43-48.
